text:
JNDIConnectionSource.activateOptions calls
ConnectionSourceSkeleton.discoverConnnectionProperties which sets
dialectCode but JNDIConnectionSource redeclares dialectCode from what
is declared in the super class ConnectionSourceSkeleton.

To fix it, just remove the own attribute and the own
getter function for dialectCode in
JNDIConnectionSource class.
creator: Arthur.Brown@gmx.net
carnold@apache.org
text:
Not a 1.2.12 candidate since the code in question does not exist in the 1.2 branch.  I've changed the 
visibility of ConnectionSourceSkeleton members variables to private and made their accessors and 
mutators private.  Other uses of package visible and protected members should be reviewed as part of the 
log4j 1.3 release process.
